text: Mary Reilly is a 1996 American horror movie. It is about a lonely servant in the home of a doctor. Julia Roberts plays the title character. Glenn Close plays Mrs Farraday. John Malkovich plays Jekyll and Hyde. It also stars George Cole and Bob Mason This movie was released on February 23, 1996. The reviews were poor. The movie did poorly at the box office. == Other websites == * Category:1996 horror movies Category:American horror movies Category:Dissociative identity disorder in fiction Category:English-language movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in England Category:Movies set in the 19th century Category:Movies directed by Stephen Frears
title: Mary Reilly
